sources.title: The Devil's Pass
sources.description: Title: The Devil's Pass Summary: Bill Buckle has had a dream--he wants to buy back the family fishing boat, the Cascade, which the family had to sell years ago to pay for his father's funeral. However, the boat is now ... Directed by: Darcy Conyers Actors: John Slater, Christopher Warbey, Joan Newell Production Company: Darcy Conyers Productions Release Date: April 1957 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Bill Buckle has had a dream--he wants to buy back the family fishing boat, the Cascade, which the family had to sell years ago to pay for his father's funeral. However, the boat is now owned by a trio of fishermen, and their plans for the boat don't coincide with Bill's at all.

metadata.Plot: Bill Buckle has had a dream--he wants to buy back the family fishing boat, the Cascade, which the family had to sell years ago to pay for his father's funeral. However, the boat is now owned by a trio of fishermen, and their plans for the boat don't coincide with Bill's at all.
metadata.Actors: John Slater, Christopher Warbey, Joan Newell
